revised_title: Petrology and Geological History of Basement Rocks from Palmer Ridge, NE Atlantic
tldr: This article provides a detailed petrographic account of the igneous and metamorphic rocks collected from Palmer Ridge in the NE Atlantic. The authors report radiometric dates on the rocks and discuss the geological history and structure of the area. The study raises certain petrological problems, particularly the physical conditions under which the amphibolites were metamorphosed. The article also describes the chemical analyses of rocks and electron probe analyses of minerals found in the area.
